name: Thump Men Alpha
description:
THE BEST PLATFORMER FIGHTING GAME IS HERE!!!

Game Instructions:
Try to land on foes to score kill points by stepping on their head and crushing their skulls!
Use gravity shackle and powerups to maximize your thumping capabilities!
First to reach 50 kills wins the match.

Player1 controls:
WASD - movement
S - throw gravity shackle
space - jump
W - fire Homing Rocket(costs 2 killcombo points), fire Alpha Razor(available with 5 killcombo points and costs 3 points)

Player2 controls:
directional button - movement
down - throw gravity shackle
enter - jump
up - fire Homing Rocket(costs 2 killcombo points), fire Alpha Razor(available with 5 killcombo points and costs 3 points)

Player3 controls: (xbox 360 controller)
d-pad - movement
X - throw gravity shackle
A - jump
Y - fire Homing Rocket(costs 2 killcombo points), fire Alpha Razor(available with 5 killcombo points and costs 3 points)

gravity shackle - disable jump and cut move speed in half

HOMING ROCKET - Gravity shackle/powerups acts as lock-on-target device,
when the shackle/powerup effect wears off the homing capability of the
rocket is gone. Homing Rockets are also affected by gravity shackle and
other powerups when hit.

ALPHA RAZOR - Bounces through walls. The player who fired the razor can catch it again. Also affected by shackle/powerup.

Power ups:
on fire - instant kill on player to player collision
on ice - on target hit, disable moving and jumping
on shock - on target hit, invert move controls

On main menu:
up/down directional button to choose
press enter to change or start battle

In-game:
Press 'P' to pause game and view controls.
Press 'O' to return to the main menu.
